title: Mastering the Unified Command Center
author: Ekobol Product Team
image_alt: Unified Command Center interface with shortcuts and batch actions
image_caption: Control your entire e-commerce empire from a single screen.
p1: The Unified Command Center is the heart of Ekobol's efficiency engine. It pulls data from all your connected marketplaces into a standardized, actionable grid. Learn how to use keyboard shortcuts, batch actions, and advanced filters to process hundreds of orders in minutes.
p2: The Command Center replaces the need to switch between tabs. It normalizes data into a single format.
li1_text: Search across orders, products, customers, and settings instantly (Ctrl+K).
li2_text: Toggle views between 'All Channels', 'Trendyol Only', 'Amazon Only', etc.
li3_text: Context-aware toolbar that appears when items are selected.
p3: Keep your hands on the keyboard to speed up workflows by 50%.
p4: Press '?' at any time to view the full cheat sheet of available shortcuts.
p5: Perform actions on multiple items simultaneously.
li4_text: Select multiple orders using checkboxes (or Shift+Click for range).
li6_text: Scan/Enter tracking numbers sequentially or upload CSV.
li7_text: Click 'Confirm' - updates are pushed to all respective marketplaces.
li10_text: Enter new value (e.g., increase price by 10%).
p6: Create custom views to focus on specific tasks.
li12_text: Apply filters (e.g., Status: 'Pending', Marketplace: 'Trendyol', Value: '>1000 TL').
li13_text: Click 'Save View' in the top right.
li15_text: Access it instantly from the sidebar.
p7: The fastest way to do anything in Ekobol.
li16_text: Type '>' to run commands (e.g., '>Create Product', '>Switch Theme').
li17_text: Type just text to search content (products, orders, customers).
li18_text: Recent items appear at the top for quick access.
p8: Track what's happening in your account in real-time.
li19_text: Open the 'Activity' panel to see recent syncs and user actions.
li20_text: Click on any log entry to see technical details (JSON payload).
li21_text: Filter by user to see team member activity.
p9: Make the data work for you.
p10: Your grid preferences are saved to your profile automatically.
p11: Alerts appear within the Command Center context.
li25_text: Click the bell icon to see prioritized alerts.
li26_text: Actionable notifications allow you to resolve issues (e.g., 'Fix Sync Error') without leaving the page.
li27_text: Start your day with the 'Needs Attention' Saved View.
li28_text: Use batch processing for all repetitive tasks (printing labels, status updates).
li29_text: Learn the top 5 shortcuts you use most often.
li30_text: If data looks stale, press 'R' to refresh the current view.
li31_text: If shortcuts aren't working, ensure the focus isn't in a text input.
help_text: Want to become a certified Ekobol Power User?
